properties.name: shore.loki.batch.items
properties.description: Loki单个批次最大条目大小.

properties.name: shore.loki.batch.timeout
properties.description: Loki单个批次最大超时毫秒数.

properties.name: shore.loki.http.connection.timeout
properties.description: Loki网络发送建立连接的超时毫秒时间.

properties.name: shore.loki.http.request.timeout
properties.description: Loki网络发送等待响应的超时毫秒时间.

properties.name: shore.loki.http.tenant-id
properties.description: Loki租户标识符(仅在将日志直接发送到在多租户模式下运行的 Loki 时才需要.否则此设置无效).
